plot: An assiduous student is struggling to find a date, when she falls for a guy over the Internet. Problems arise when they plan to meet in person.
title: Unholy Roller
plot_es: An assiduous student is struggling to find a date, when she falls for a guy over the Internet. Problems arise when they plan to meet in person.
plot_en: An assiduous student is struggling to find a date, when she falls for a guy over the Internet. Problems arise when they plan to meet in person.
